entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 7:04 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:04 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
